doc:
Bill Thompson (voice actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bill_Thompson_(voice_actor) 0 William H. "Bill" Thompson (July 8, 1913 – July 15, 1971) was an American radio comedian, actor and voice actor, whose career stretched from the 1930s until his death. He was best known as a featured comedian playing multiple roles on the Fibber McGee and Molly radio series, and as the voice of Droopy in most of the Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer theatrical cartoons from 1943 to 1958. William_H._"_Bill_"_Thompson ( July_8_,_1913 – July_15_,_1971 ) was an_American_radio_comedian , actor_and_voice_actor , whose_career stretched from the_1930s until his_death . He was_best_known as a_featured_comedian playing multiple_roles on the_Fibber_McGee_and_Molly_radio_series , and as the_voice of Droopy in most of the_Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer_theatrical_cartoons from 1943 to 1958 .
